translations: n.[生化] 铃蟾肽；[生理] 蛙皮素

phrs.translation: 蛙皮素, 铃蟾肽, 铃蟾素, 细胞株蛙皮素

sentences.sentence: Bombesin, Gastrin Releasing Peptide (GRP), Rabbit anti.
sentences.translation: 蛙皮素，胃泌素释放肽(GRP)，兔抗。

sentences.sentence: When the outer circumstance temperature altered, function of Bombesin to animals changed too.
sentences.translation: 当外界环境温度不同时，蛙皮素对动物体温的作用不同。

sentences.sentence: GES-1 cell line was incubated with varying concentrations of bombesin with or without its antagonist and growth of the cell line was determined.
sentences.translation: 观察不同浓度的蛙皮素及其受体拮抗剂对GES 1细胞生长的影响。
